Articles.Content:
Salutations, soldiers.

If you are here, it means you are a member of the R.K.M. in the Navy Division. If you are not, enlist now or leave.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it:

OBJECTIVE: Build a rocket that can gently touch down in water and launch at least 4 torpedoes in sequence. None may crash into each other. Video or picture proof is required.

REWARD: An upgrade to your rank, shown with a change to your roster and signature

DEADLINE: Zero-hundred hours on the fifteenth day of the first month in the twelfth year of the first decade of the first century of the second millennium

THE KOLD WAR IS OVER!

The R.K.M wins 36-14!

Note: Since no-one participated in this challenge, no-one will receive ribbons.
